name: VIRTAUS
description:
Virtaus is a small arcade game where you collect stars while dodging hazards in order to reach the highest score. The game includes two difficulty modes, several color layouts and an abstract visual theme.

Controls:
Arrow keys / WASD = change player direction / change color layout & difficulty.
Esc = return to menu / quit game.
Enter = Select / pause game.

Virtaus is free software, released under the GNU General Public
License version 3. The source code is available in the official Git repository at
https://gitlab.com/Lommi/Virtaus/ . The source files for the game are also included in the download files.
